name: simple-text-capture
description: Obsidian plugin to capture text quickly

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && . ./.env && mkdir -p "$OBSIDIAN_PLUGIN_DEST" && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css "$OBSIDIAN_PLUGIN_DEST/"
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
